songs.name: Chasing Dreams
songs.lyrics:
I'm chasing dreams, across the endless sky,
With every step, I'm reaching for the highest high,
I won't give up, I'll never say goodbye,
I'm chasing dreams, until the day I touch the sky.

songs.name: Midnight Serenade
songs.lyrics:
In the moonlight's glow, we dance so slow,
Your whispering words, like a sweet serenade,
Underneath the stars, our love starts to grow,
In this midnight serenade, our worries fade away.

songs.name: Heart's Desire
songs.lyrics:
You're the fire in my soul, my heart's desire,
In your warm embrace, I'll never tire,
Together we'll conquer, we'll never tire,
You're the flame in my heart, my heart's desire.

songs.name: Summer Breeze
songs.lyrics:
In the golden sun, we find our ease,
Walking by the shore, feeling the summer breeze,
Hand in hand, under the tall palm trees,
Our love is like a warm, gentle summer breeze.

songs.name: City Lights
songs.lyrics:
Beneath the city lights, we'll find our way,
In the neon glow, we'll dance till break of day,
The world is ours, as we sway and play,
Beneath the city lights, our love will never sway.
